title: Process a Fuel Purchase
description: A driver uses a company fuel card to buy fuel. The transaction must be logged and associated with their truck.

tasks.description: The system receives a transaction feed from the fuel card provider.
tasks.expected_outcome: A new fuel purchase transaction is received.

tasks.description: The system uses the card number to identify the driver and their assigned truck.
tasks.expected_outcome: The transaction is linked to the correct driver and vehicle.

tasks.description: The system prompts the driver to enter their current odometer reading.
tasks.expected_outcome: The odometer reading is captured to calculate fuel economy.

tasks.description: The fuel purchase (gallons, cost, location) is logged in the system for IFTA and fuel economy reporting.
